items.title: California lawmakers pass first bills to counter Texas in nationwide fight over election maps
items.description: California races toward redrawing congressional maps as Texas moves toward final approval of its plans.

items.title: What’s at stake as Trump’s redistricting push sparks a national map fight
items.description: New congressional maps could determine which party wins control of the House in next year’s elections — but election experts say they could also shape...

items.title: Trump says he will join police, military on D.C. streets Thursday
items.description: The move continues his administration’s efforts to exert control over the capital city.

items.title: Harris to embark on tour to promote memoir about presidential campaign
items.description: The 15-city book tour will be Harris’s first series of planned public appearances around the country since she lost the election in November.

items.title: Eric Adams adviser suspended after giving reporter cash in potato chip bag
items.description: Katie Honan, a reporter for the City, said that Winnie Greco, a volunteer for Adams’s reelection campaign, apologized and told her the gesture was cul...
